title: So i opened a hextech chest.....
body: And got a hextech chest?????? troll much?

replies.body: You got something else as well, right? The added chest is just a bonus.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZTMpMWNv,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-01T02:43:33.976+0000)
>
> You got something else as well, right? The added chest is just a bonus.

I got a chest and a key, thats it

> [{quoted}](name=Xavanic,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZTMpMWNv,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-03-01T02:44:15.125+0000)
>
> I got a chest and a key, thats it

That is definitely not meant to happen, unless you mean with a gemstone?

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZTMpMWNv,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2018-03-01T02:45:03.974+0000)
>
> That is definitely not meant to happen, unless you mean with a gemstone?

nope, just 2 items, hextech chest and hextech key

> [{quoted}](name=Xavanic,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZTMpMWNv,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2018-03-01T03:25:37.554+0000)
>
> nope, just 2 items, hextech chest and hextech key

Had that before. I was like, "Uh...I want my 10 secodns of life back". Then rerolled and got something meh.
I would rather have that than 2 sion champion shards from the same chest.
I got that 3 times in a row once. It was weird, I thought I broke the lottery.

What's in the box?
Another box!

> [{quoted}](name=Ok sure but why,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZTMpMWNv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-01T02:40:11.808+0000)
>
> What's in the box?
> Another box!

Exactly
